Campfire Devotions

Gather around the fire. The stars are out, the world is quiet, and it's time to meet with Jesus.

These devotionals are inspired by nights spent camping in the Australian outback.

Finding Hope

Light in the Darkness

When the night is darkest, the stars shine brightest. Discover how Jesus is the light that cannot be overcome.

Read devotion

Finding Peace

Still Waters

Learning to be still in a world that never stops moving. The ocean teaches us about God's peace.

Read devotion

Perseverance

The Long Road

When the journey seems endless, keep putting one foot in front of the other. God is with you.

Read devotion

God's Provision

Roadhouse Grace

Finding unexpected grace in unlikely places. God provides oases in our wilderness.

Read devotion

God's Welcome

Running Home

The Father is already running to meet you. You don't have to earn your way back.

Read devotion

Faith and Risk

Leaving the Familiar

Sometimes faith means leaving what you know behind. Abraham's call echoes through the ages.

Read devotion

Join Us Around the Fire

New devotionals are added regularly. Take time each evening to quiet your heart and let the warmth of Jesus' presence surround you.

Bible StudiesExplore the Journey
Running to God

A journey of faith through the Australian outback. Discover the road from Perth to Port Lincoln, and learn what it means to run from ourselves and into the loving arms of Jesus.

"Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you." — James 4:8
